title: 【Cthuwork】Cthuzine English! 第二期发布
author: kaho
txt_content:
本帖最后由 kaho 于 2014-11-15 11:33 编辑 



注意
本帖的最终解释权归cthuwork及原作者所有如有疑问或转载请联系相关负责人



CTHUZINE English! Monthly, As Simple, As possible!CTHUZINE English! 月刊，越简单，越深入人心！

After Cthuzine published, this is Vol.2 of Cthuzine English!
The contents has lots of different between English versions and Chinese versions
We'll try to publish Chinese and English version at the same time!

在中文版第二期发布后，Cthuzine English! 终于发布！
英文版和中文版的大多内容是不一样的
我们尽量会与中文版同一时间发布！

(以英文版为准，中文版仅供参考)
(English version is the standard one,Chinese version is only for information.)

开始阅读！Start Reading! 























 

News Source: MinecraftFourm、The Verge新闻来源：MinecraftFourm、The Verge

If you want to know more about Cthuzine & Cthuzine English!, Just subscribe our Weibo!
如果你想对Cthuzine & Cthuzine English! 了解更多，关注我们的微博吧！


@Cthuzine_studio

If you want to join us, just send a E-mail(kaho@baka.wang) to kaho. We'll contact you as soon as possible.
如果你想加入我们，把你的个人资料发到kaho的电邮(kaho@baka.wang)。我们会派专人联系你。


Cthuwork，With the impossible, creating possible!
Cthuwork，用不可能，创造可能！

Cthuwork's Weibo：@Cthuwork
Cthuwork的微博：@Cthuwork
